actions.name: Power Construct

cost.trigger: The user is reduced to 50% or fewer HP.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is reduced to 50% or fewer HP.
Effect: Connection - Core Enforcer. The user transforms into their Complete Forme the rest of the combat, and recovers HP equal to 1/2 their Max HP after changing formes.

actions.name: Power Construct
actions.description: Passive: When the user uses Core Enforcer, they recover a Tick of HP.
